content: a simple crochet project suitable for crochet beginners for the bag to look nice you will have to line it which requires some sewing experience - i have prepared a tutorial to help 1 for the original caramella i have used exactly one skein of lang quattro colour yarn for granita variation in single_crochet i have used 1 5 skeins of lang yarns golf color if you would like to substitute with another variegated yarn i suggest making sure the colour sections are quite short details about modifications for granita can be found in this post 2 updated more sophisticated version - grand caramella - free pattern can be found on my website as well 3 1 https //silkandwool eu/lining-crochet-bags-tutorial/ 2 https //silkandwool eu/granita-crochet-bag/ 3 https //silkandwool eu/grand-caramella-crochet-bag/
